title: Karen Possehl Women's Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship support at the University of Colorado Colorado Springs for nontraditional students who are often single parents, have physical challenges, are caretakers for aging parents, or have faced adversity or significant life challenges.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship support at the University of Colorado Colorado Springs for nontraditional students who are often single parents, have physical challenges, are caretakers for aging parents, or have faced adversity or significant life challenges.
